name: 5 Things
description:
5 Things was an idea originated from the Safe Spaces Game Jam theme. Our intention was to really create a safe space on your phone, for when you might be feeling stressed or on the verge of a panic attack. This game features 2 simples exercises to combat anxiety, such as breathing and mind affirmations.

Meant for mobile.

Created by:

Rute Xavier - Art and Game Design (https://rutexavier.artstation.com/resume)

David Santos - Programming (https://twitter.com/D4bide  /  https://d4bbo.itch.io/)

Ana Franco - Art (https://www.artstation.com/neo7wolfs / https://www.instagram.com/anafrancoartwork/)
